headline: The Media Trust Launches Inaugural Product Advisory Council to Strengthen Industry Defense Against Digital Threats
summary: MCLEAN, Va., February 26, 2026--Yesterday, The Media Trust (TMT) convened the inaugural meeting of its Product Advisory Council, bringing together senior leaders from across the advertising technology ecosystem to advance coordinated action against escalating digital threats.

headline: Warner Bros. Discovery Weighs Paramount Bid Against Netflix Deal Narrative
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery (NasdaqGS:WBD) is reviewing an improved takeover bid from Paramount that its board says could qualify as a Company Superior Proposal versus its existing Netflix agreement. The board is consulting advisors and has given Netflix a set window to match Paramount's enhanced offer, creating a live bidding contest between two major media groups. This review process marks a key point for Warner Bros. Discovery's future ownership structure and could influence how its content...

headline: Netflix ditches deal for Warner Bros. Discovery after Paramount’s offer is deemed superior

headline: Disney’s AI Bet And Florida Expansion Reshape Parks And IP Story
summary: Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS) is partnering with OpenAI to use artificial intelligence for content creation featuring its well known franchises. Kristina Schake is set to leave her role as Chief Communications Officer after a period described as transformative for the company. Disney is moving ahead with large scale expansion plans in Florida after reaching a peace agreement with its local oversight district. For investors watching media and entertainment, Disney sits at the intersection of film,...
